name: UpdateAzureScanOptions
description:
Update Agentless scan options for an Azure subscription.

Use this tool to update the Agentless scanning preferences for a specified Azure subscription in Datadog.

parameters.name: azure_subscription_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Azure subscription to update scan options.

parameters.name: azure_subscription_identifier
parameters.description: The Azure subscription ID for which to update scan options.

parameters.name: azure_scan_options_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the resource type for Azure scan options, must be 'azure_scan_options'.

parameters.name: enable_container_vulnerability_scanning
parameters.description: Enable or disable container vulnerability scanning. Set to true to enable, false to disable.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in containers is enabled.

parameters.name: enable_scanning_for_host_vulnerabilities
parameters.description: Enable or disable scanning for vulnerabilities in host operating systems.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in hosts is enabled.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.vuln_containers_os
parameters.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in containers is enabled.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in containers is enabled.

parameters.name: data.attributes.vuln_host_os
parameters.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in hosts is enabled.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in hosts is enabled.
